mapper.select: select b.id id, board_title, board_uri, board_description, upload_file_name, store_file_name, board_create_date, board_update_date, b.member_id member_id, bf.favor favor, favor_regiDate from board b right join board_favor bf on b.id = bf.board_id where bf.member_id = #{memberId} order by favor_regiDate desc;
mapper.insert: insert into board_favor (member_id, board_id,favor, favor_regiDate) value (#{memberId},#{boardId},1,now());
mapper.delete: delete from board_favor where member_id =#{memberId} and board_id=#{boardId}
